name: XmlTreeBuilderTest
description: Unit tests for the XmlTreeBuilder class, focusing on XML parsing and handling various XML structures and declarations.

test_cases.name: testSimpleXmlParse
test_cases.description: Tests the basic XML parsing functionality, ensuring correct parsing and attribute handling.

test_cases.name: testPopToClose
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of mismatched tags in XML parsing, ensuring correct closing of tags.

test_cases.name: testCommentAndDocType
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of XML comments and DOCTYPE declarations during parsing.

test_cases.name: testSupplyParserToJsoupClass
test_cases.description: Tests the ability to supply a custom XML parser to the Jsoup class for parsing XML content.

test_cases.name: testSupplyParserToConnection
test_cases.description: Tests the ability to supply a custom XML parser to a Jsoup connection for parsing remote XML content.

test_cases.name: testSupplyParserToDataStream
test_cases.description: Tests the ability to parse XML from a data stream using a custom XML parser.

test_cases.name: testDoesNotForceSelfClosingKnownTags
test_cases.description: Tests that the XML parser does not force self-closing tags for known HTML tags.

test_cases.name: handlesXmlDeclarationAsDeclaration
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of XML declarations as valid XML nodes.

test_cases.name: xmlFragment
test_cases.description: Tests the parsing of XML fragments and the handling of absolute URLs.

test_cases.name: xmlParseDefaultsToHtmlOutputSyntax
test_cases.description: Tests that the XML parser defaults to HTML output syntax.

test_cases.name: testDoesHandleEOFInTag
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of EOF within tags during XML parsing.

test_cases.name: testDetectCharsetEncodingDeclaration
test_cases.description: Tests the detection of charset encoding declarations in XML files.

test_cases.name: testParseDeclarationAttributes
test_cases.description: Tests the parsing of attributes in XML declarations.

test_cases.name: testParseDeclarationWithoutAttributes
test_cases.description: Tests the parsing of XML declarations without attributes.

test_cases.name: caseSensitiveDeclaration
test_cases.description: Tests the case sensitivity of XML declarations.

test_cases.name: testCreatesValidProlog
test_cases.description: Tests the creation of a valid XML prolog in a document.

test_cases.name: preservesCaseByDefault
test_cases.description: Tests that the XML parser preserves tag case by default.

test_cases.name: appendPreservesCaseByDefault
test_cases.description: Tests that appending elements preserves tag case by default.

test_cases.name: disablesPrettyPrintingByDefault
test_cases.description: Tests that pretty printing is disabled by default in the XML parser.

test_cases.name: canNormalizeCase
test_cases.description: Tests the ability to normalize tag case in the XML parser.

test_cases.name: normalizesDiscordantTags
test_cases.description: Tests the normalization of discordant tags in the XML parser.

test_cases.name: roundTripsCdata
test_cases.description: Tests the round-tripping of CDATA sections in the XML parser.

test_cases.name: cdataPreservesWhiteSpace
test_cases.description: Tests that whitespace is preserved in CDATA sections.

test_cases.name: handlesDodgyXmlDecl
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of malformed XML declarations.

test_cases.name: handlesLTinScript
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of '<' characters in script tags.

test_cases.name: dropsDuplicateAttributes
test_cases.description: Tests that duplicate attributes are dropped in the XML parser.

test_cases.name: readerClosedAfterParse
test_cases.description: Tests that the reader is closed after parsing.

test_cases.name: xmlParserEnablesXmlOutputAndEscapes
test_cases.description: Tests that the XML parser enables XML output and escapes entities correctly.

test_cases.name: xmlSyntaxEscapesLtInAttributes
test_cases.description: Tests that '<' characters in attributes are escaped in XML syntax.

test_cases.name: xmlOutputCorrectsInvalidAttributeNames
test_cases.description: Tests that invalid attribute names are corrected in XML output.

test_cases.name: customTagsAreFlyweights
test_cases.description: Tests that custom tags are flyweights in the XML parser.

test_cases.name: rootHasXmlSettings
test_cases.description: Tests that the root element has XML settings.

test_cases.name: xmlNamespace
test_cases.description: Tests the handling of XML namespaces.
